author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This is another PR to port all L1T Phase-2 developments to cms-sw. This PR targets the particle flow code. It includes several PRs made locally, the details of which can be found in the twiki https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideL1TPhase2Instructions and in the cms-l1t-offline branch.

The code is equivalent to the old PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37452 but has been reorganized to have a structure more CMS-friendly.
title: L1T phase-2: particle flow and correlator updates (code reorganized)
